attributes.action: Bideford and Torridge  councils devon;  no confidence  following failure to secure community facilities at Moreton Park, Bideford housing development.
attributes.additional_details:
Bideford and Torridge  councils Devon; we have no confidence in Bideford town council and Torridge district council following their failure to secure community facilities as part of housing development in Moreton Park Bideford.
This follows on previous failures to offer a berth and secure the sailing ship Kathleen and May as a tourist attraction and the Jubilee square fiasco.
We ask a review of the planning department and public explanation of the reasons for these decisions and a special election of all councillors from both councils.
